radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Enlarged subcarinal, right hilar, and diaphragmatic pericaval lymph nodes; enlarged spleen measuring 18.3 cm; retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy including a portacaval lymph node measuring 3.2 cm, an aortocaval lymph node measuring 1.2 cm, and a superior pancreatic lymph node measuring 2.9 cm

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the right humerus and forearm
radiographic_examinations.findings: Rim-enhancing fluid collection measuring 3.1 cm in the extensor compartment of the mid-forearm; overlying skin thickening and subcutaneous edema along the dorsal forearm; no evidence of acute fracture or dislocation
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Fluid collection was aspirated the day after admission

radiographic_examinations.findings: Fluid collection in the right forearm
